content: अनार्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Not respectable (not deserving to be styled आर्य), not polite or decent; vulgar; not belonging to an Ārya, unworthy, vile, base, mean, wretched; अनार्यानार्यलिंगिनः <ls>Ms. 9. 260</ls>; अनार्यायां समुत्पन्नो ब्राह्मणात् <ls n="Ms.">10. 66</ls>; <ls>H. 4. 25</ls>; कीटका नाम देशोऽनार्यनिवासः <ls>Nir.</ls> void of Āryas; शकुंतलायामनार्यमाचरितं तेन राज्ञा <ls>Ś. 4</ls> the king has behaved basely or unworthily towards Śakuntalā; कदाचिदस्मिन्नप्यनार्योऽनार्यमाचरिष्यति <ls>Ve. 4.</ls> --र्यः {@--1@} One who is not an Ārya. {@--2@} A country not inhabited by the Āryas. {@--3@} A Śūdra. {@--4@} A Mleccha. {@--5@} An ignoble person.
